settings.text: Use our high-quality saunas to relax and rejuvenate at home, truly enjoy the comfort of home life and reshape home health.

Born for comfort, created for life, infrared drives health.

We believe: True sauna health should not be the privilege of high-end clubs, nor should it be out of reach. It should be integrated into daily life and within reach. This is the starting point of Outexer, creating a convenient, reliable, and deeply revitalizing sauna, so that the ultimate comfortable experience can easily enter your home.

This belief drives us forward. From 2020 to 2023, three years of hard work. Our technical team flew across more than a dozen countries and had in-depth exchanges with 200+ top sauna manufacturers, engineers and health experts around the world. We listened to user pain points and repeatedly tested and verified, just to thoroughly understand one thing: What kind of sauna is truly safe, efficient, and worthy of being part of your healthy living space?

In 2023, the exploration finally bore fruit. The first Outexer infrared sauna room was officially launched!

Every Outexer carries our solemn promise:

  • Born for comfort: Make every use an ultimate enjoyment.
  • Born for safety and reliability: Quality is worthy of your 100% trust.
  • Born for healthy life: Accompany you and your family every day, full of vitality.

settings.caption: BUILT FOR COMFORT, ENGINEERED FOR RESULTS
settings.heading: Infrared Heating Meets Exceptional Craftsmanship
settings.text: Every Outexer sauna is a promise of quality. We insist on hand-selected Okoume or Canadian hemlock to lay a solid foundation; equipped with low-electromagnetic field carbon fiber heating panels, infrared heat evenly penetrates the whole body, warms directly to the core, and is safe and worry-free; whether indoor or outdoor models, they are equipped with reinforced tempered glass doors, carefully optimized ventilation systems and minimalist intelligent control - just to ensure that every sauna experience is safer, more comfortable and smarter.

settings.caption: TRUSTED NATIONWIDE, BACKED BY SERVICE
settings.heading: Trusted by Thousands, Backed by Support
settings.text:
From city apartments to detached homes, Outexer saunas are trusted by wellness enthusiasts across the country. We go beyond high-quality products to create meaningful wellness experiences with responsive U.S.-based customer service, a five-year warranty, and 30-day returns.
Our team goes beyond the basics to provide personalized one-on-one guidance and hands-on technical support, whether you have product questions, installation issues, or need help choosing the right sauna. Wellness isn't a flash in the pan, it's a lifestyle habit that needs to be practiced every day. We make it sustainable, convenient, and reliable.

settings.caption: Outexer Sauna: Reimagine Wellness with Our Premium Indoor and Outdoor Saunas

settings.text: Outexer offers a diverse range of saunas designed to bring the ultimate relaxation experience to any space – whether indoors or outdoors. We meticulously blend advanced heating technology with elegant, durable designs to deliver an unparalleled sauna experience. Whether you're seeking a private retreat in your home or a luxurious addition to your backyard, Outexer has the perfect sauna for you.

settings.caption: Outexer Team: Redefining Workplace Happiness with Passion and Purpose

settings.text: Outexer team is at the heart of everything we do. We believe that a happy and fulfilled team is the key to creating exceptional sauna experiences for our customers. From fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation to providing opportunities for growth and well-being, we are committed to making Outexer a place where everyone thrives. Join us and discover what it means to work in a truly inspiring environment.

• Legal Business Name: Outexer LLC
  • Business Address: 30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, United States
  • Email: support@outexer.com
  • Call Us: +1 (424) 205-4342
  • EIN: 33-3748503
  • Business Registration: Outexer LLC is a legally registered company in the State of Wyoming, USA.

We are committed to providing professional, sincere and high-quality services. Our goal is to provide every customer with a trustworthy and refreshing home health experience.
